Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ, ZrO2-8% Y2O3) films were deposited onto lanthanum strontium manganite (LSM, La0.7Sr0.3MnO3) substrates using dip-coating process aiming for the application in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by dip-coating on La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 substrate: Influence of synthesis parameters

Sentencas: YSZ precursor was prepared by sol-gel method; three values of the organic/inorganic concentration ratio (1, 3 and 5) were utilized and the sol viscosity was adjusted (60 mPa.s and 100 mPa.s) before deposition on the substrate.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by dip-coating on La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 substrate: Influence of synthesis parameters

Sentencas: The influence of these synthesis parameters on the structure and morphology of the deposited films was examined by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by dip-coating on La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 substrate: Influence of synthesis parameters

Sentencas: The films showed characteristic peaks of LSM, YSZ (with cubic structure) and secondary phases of SrZrO3 and La2O3.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by dip-coating on La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 substrate: Influence of synthesis parameters

Sentencas: Depending on the synthesis conditions, crack-free, homogeneous and well adhered films were obtained, with thickness of 11-24 mu m.
Titulo: Characterization of yttria-stabilized zirconia films deposited by dip-coating on La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 substrate: Influence of synthesis parameters
